title: FTP Directory Traversal
description: Exploit directory traversal in a misconfigured FTP server to retrieve a hidden flag.
hints: Try accessing directories not listed in the FTP server using typical traversal methods.
Anonymous login is enabled, use it to explore the FTP server.
Pay attention to how the paths are structured to bypass restrictions.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP server setup and potential misconfigurations.
Learn directory traversal techniques and how they apply to FTP.
Practice using FTP client tools to explore and exploit vulnerabilities.
